column1: 1 Ratings are for control of emerged marestail only. Marestail emerges in fall, spring, and early summer, and use of burndown plus residual herbicides in early spring results in most effective control. See "horseweed (marestail)" in the "Problem Weed" section for more information.                                                    2 Chlorimuron products: Canopy, Cloak, Valor XLT, Fierce XLT, Envive, Authority XL/MAXX, Zone Maxx. Cloransulam products: Authority First, Sonic, FirstRate, Surveil.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          3 Saflufenacil products: Sharpen, Verdict, Zidua PRO.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         4 Tribenuron products: Express, Panoflex.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 5 Rimsulfuron products: Resolve, Basis, Prequel, Crusher.
